functions.name: k8s_sensitive_data_validation_testing
functions.description: Validates sensitive data handling through testing.

notes: All functions are based on Kubernetes K8S_TESTING API.
Ensure proper RBAC permissions are configured.
K8S_TESTING is a Kubernetes component for compliance testing.
Configuration, security, monitoring, testing, and compliance are key aspects.
Implement appropriate retry logic for API calls.
Use Kubernetes client libraries for API interactions.
